text: Hanna Herbst (born 1990 Mainz) is a German journalist and author. == Life == Herbst was born in Mainz, and moved to Salzburg in 1998. From 2008, she studied Political Science in Vienna. From September 2015, she was Deputy Editor-in-Chief of Vice Austria. In 2016, Forbes named her as one of 30 people in Austria under 30. == Works == * Feministin sagt man nicht. Wien: Christian Brandstätter Verlag 2018. == References == == External links == * Hanna Herbst *Hanna Herbst Interview >> Elevate Festival 2016 in Elevate Festival 2016 - Interviews Category:Living people Category:German women journalists Category:21st-century German journalists Category:21st-century German women writers Category:1990 births Category:People from Mainz
title: Hanna Herbst
